value.title: Emerging technologies that will advance the retail industry
value.excerpt: In response to this changing landscape, retailers have brought forward technology investments to accelerate their digital business transformation, particularly in artificial intelligence (AI) technologies with retailers often utilizing AI-enabled third-party vendor applications to solve immediate challenges before moving to more strategic deployments once they gain evidence of the benefits.

value.title: With deep learning algorithms, standard CT technology produces spectral images

value.title: Is Artificial Intelligence Closer to Common Sense?
value.excerpt: Intelligent agents lack the common-sense knowledge they need to reason about the world. Traditionally, there have been two unsuccessful approaches to getting computers to reason about the world—symbolic logic and deep learning.
